doc.field: MORE U.S. BANKS JOIN IN PRIME RATE CUT

- Chemical Bank, the main bank subsidiary of Chemical New York Corp, and Marine Midland Banks Inc said they were raising the prime lending rate to 7-3/4 pct from 7-1/2 pct, effective immediately. In St Louis, Mercantile Bancorp said its Mercantile Bank N.A. was also raising its prime rate to 7-3/4 pct from 7-1/2 pct, effective immediately. The changes follow similar cuts yesterday by Citicorp and Chase Manhattan.
